extraction.title: ServiceBeacon.java line 267
extraction.description: There's a lot more information about this crash on crashlytics.com: https://fabric.io/owntracks/android/apps/org.owntracks.android/issues/550942235141dcfd8f281c7c
extraction.comments: @GeorgeHahn also, looking at the AltBeacon library code, your code never calls the library bind methods (hence the error that I mentioned in #70).
